entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
